maqras.text: 100|9|Tabe ki se jane na yakhana kabare ya ache ta ut'thita habe
100|10|ara antare ya ache ta prakasa kara habe [1]
100|11|niscaya tadera raba sedina tadera byapare sabisesa abahita [1].
101|1|Bhitiprada maha bipada [1]
101|2|bhitiprada maha bipada ki
101|3|ara bhitiprada maha bipada samparke apanake kise janabe
101|4|sedina manusa habe biksipta patangera mata [1]
101|5|ara parbatasamuha habe dhunita rangina pasamera mata [1].
101|6|Atahpara yara pallasamuha [1] bhari habe [2]
101|7|se to thakabe santosajanaka jibane.
101|8|Ara yara pallasamuha halka habe [1]
101|9|tara sthana habe ‘ha'oyiyah’ [1].
101|10|Ara apanake kise janabe seta ki
101|11|atyanta uttapta aguna [1].
102|1|Tomaderake mohacchanna rakhe [1] pracuryera pratiyogita [2]
102|2|yataksana na tomara kabare upanita ha'o [1].
102|3|Kakhano naya, tomara sighra'i janate parabe [1]
102|4|tarapara, kakhano naya, tomara sighra'i janate parabe
102|5|kakhano naya! Yadi tomara niscita jnane jnani hate--- [1]
102|6|abasya'i tomara jahannama dekhabe
102|7|tarapara abasya'i tomara ta dekhabe caksusa pratyaye [1]
102|8|tarapara abasya'i sedina tomaderake neyamata samparke prasna kara habe [1].
103|1|Samayera sapatha [1]
103|2|niscaya manusa [1] ksatira majhe nipatita [2]
103|3|Kintu tara naya [1], yara imana eneche [2] ebam satkaja kareche [3] ara parasparake upadesa diyeche hakera [4] ebam upadesa diyeche dhairyera [5].
104|1|Durbhoga pratyekera, ye pichane o samane lokera ninda kare [1]
104|2|ye sampada jamaya o ta bara bara ganana kare [1]
104|3|se dharana kare ye, tara artha take amara kare rakhabe [1]
104|4|kakhana'o na, se abasya'i niksipta habe [1] hutamaya [2]
104|5|ara apanake kise janabe hutama ki
104|6|eta allahara prajbalita aguna [1]
104|7|ya hrdayake graasa karabe [1]
104|8|niscaya eta taderake paribestana kare rakhabe [1]
104|9|dirghayita stambhasamuhe [1].
105|1|Apani ki dekhena ni [1] apanara raba hatira adhipatidera prati ki karechilena
105|2|tini ki tadera kausala byarthataya paryabasita kare denani
105|3|ara [1] tadera birud'dhe tini jhamke jhamke pakhi pathana [2]
105|4|yara tadera upara sakta poramatira kankara niksepa kare [1].
105|5|Atahpara tini taderake bhaksita trna-sadrsa karena [1].
106|1|Kura'ise[1]ra asaktira karane [2]
106|2|tadera asakti ache sita o grisme sapharera [1]
106|3|ata'eba, tara ‘ibadata karuka e gharera rabera [1]
106|4|yini taderake ksudhaya khadya diyechena [1] ebam bhiti theke taderake nirapada karechena [2].
107|1|Apani ki dekhechena [1] take, ye dinake [2] asbikara kare
107|2|se to se-i, ye iyatimake rurhabhabe tariye deya [1]
107|3|ara se ud'dhud'dha kare na [1] misakinadera khadya dane.
107|4|Kaje'i durbhoga se salata adayakaridera
107|5|yara tadera salata sambandhe udasina
107|6|yara loka dekhanora jan'ya ta kare [1]
107|7|ebam ma‘una [1] pradana karate birata thake.
108|1|Niscaya amara apanake ka'uchara [1] dana karechi.
108|2|Kaje'i apani apanara rabera uddesye salata adaya karuna ebam kurabani karuna [1].
108|3|Niscaya apanara prati bidbesa posanakari'i to nirbansa [1].
109|1|Baluna, ‘he kaphirara
109|2|‘ami tara ‘ibadata kari na yara ‘ibadata tomara kara [1]
109|3|Ebam tomara'o tamra ‘ibadatakari na'o yamra ‘ibadata ami kari [1]
109|4|ebam ami ‘ibadatakari na'i tara yara ‘ibadata tomara kare asacha.
109|5|Ebam tomara'o tamra ‘ibadatakari habe na yamra ‘ibadata ami kari
109|6|tomadera dina tomadera, ara amara dbina amara [1].’
110|1|Yakhana asabe allahara sahayya o bijaya [1]
110|2|ara apani manusake dale dale allahara dine prabesa karate dekhabena [1]
110|3|takhana apani apanara rabera prasansasaha tamra pabitrata o mahima ghosana karuna ebam tamra kache ksama prarthana karuna, niscaya tini ta'oba kabulakari [1].
111|1|Dhbansa hoka abu lahabera [1] du‘hata [2] ebam dhbansa hayeche se nije'o.
111|2|Tara dhana-sampada o tara uparjana [1] tara kono kaje ase ni.
111|3|Acire se dagdha habe lelihana agune [1]
111|4|ara tara stri'o [1]- ye indhana bahana kare [2]
111|5|tara galaya [1] pakano rasi [2].
112|1|Baluna [1], ‘tini allah, eka-adbitiya [2]
112|2|‘allah hacchena ‘samada' [1] (tini karo mukhapeksi nana, sakale'i tamra mukhapeksi)
112|3|tini ka'uke'o janma denani ebam tamke'o janma deya hayani [1]
112|4|‘ebam tamra samatulya ke'u'i ne'i [1].’
113|1|Baluna [1], ‘ami asraya prarthana karachi [2] usara rabera [3]
113|2|tini ya srsti karechena tara anista hate [1]
113|3|ara anista hate ratera andhakarera, yakhana ta gabhira haya [1]
113|4|ara anista hate samasta naridera, yara giraya phumka deya [1]
113|5|ara anista hate hinsukera [1], yakhana se hinsa kare [2].’
114|1|Baluna, ‘ami asraya prarthana karachi manusera rabera
114|2|manusera adhipatira
114|3|manusera ilahera kache [1]
114|4|atmagopanakari kumantranadatara [1] anista hate
114|5|ye kumantrana deya manusera antare
114|6|jinera madhya theke ebam manusera madhya theke [1].’
